description:
EU-funded initiative CERTAIN aims to drive ethical AI compliance in Europe amid increasing regulations like the EU AI Act. CERTAIN — short for “Certification for Ethical and Regulatory Transparency in Artificial Intelligence” — will focus on the development of tools and frameworks that promote transparency, compliance, and sustainability in AI technologies. The project is led […]

The post CERTAIN drives ethical AI compliance in Europe  appeared first on AI News.
title: CERTAIN drives ethical AI compliance in Europe
